tasks.label: curl-feed-story-smoke
args: API=$(awk -F '"' '/Value:/ {print $2}' /home/charles12/tweeter_project/tweeter-server/.aws-sam/build/template.yaml | head -n1 || true); if [ -z "$API" ]; then API=https://f4qppccqjk.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/prod; fi; echo Using $API; echo 'POST /feed/list'; curl -s -i -X OPTIONS $API/feed/list | head -n 20; curl -s -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' $API/feed/list -d '{"targetUserAlias":"@alice","pageSize":5,"lastItemTimestamp":null}' | sed -e 's/{"items":\[.*/{"items":[...],"hasMore":true,"success":true}/'; echo; echo 'POST /story/list'; curl -s -i -X OPTIONS $API/story/list | head -n 20; curl -s -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' $API/story/list -d '{"targetUserAlias":"@alice","pageSize":5,"lastItemTimestamp":null}' | sed -e 's/{"items":\[.*/{"items":[...],"hasMore":true,"success":true}/'
